definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
to feel attached to/to long for/to love

sentences.english: Most guys who like cross-dressing are heterosexual.
sentences.chinese: 许多喜欢穿异性服装的男生是异性恋。

sentences.english: The money so much a heterosexuality to feel again we beautiful man but have no courage.
sentences.chinese: 人好有钱是异性恋又觉得我们漂亮的男人却又没胆量。

sentences.english: The handsome and nice men are typicingly gay.
sentences.chinese: 又帅又好的男我不知道同志影片人是异性恋。

sentences.english: These morphs were then rated for attractiveness by 77 heterosexual male students.
sentences.chinese: 然后，77名异性恋男生对这些变体评定吸引力情况。

sentences.english: For example, lesbian and gay young people are not 'failed' heterosexuals.
sentences.chinese: 比如，拉拉和同志青年不“亚于”异性恋。

sentences.english: I am a submissive, heterosexual woman.
sentences.chinese: 我是一个顺从的异性恋女人。

sentences.english: Heterosexuality is not normal, it's just common.
sentences.chinese: 异性恋并非正常，普遍而已。

sentences.english: This figure contrasts with 12 percent of heterosexual teens.
sentences.chinese: 这个数字与异性恋青少年的12%形成鲜明对比。

sentences.english: Similar percentages of men and women identified as either straight or homosexual.
sentences.chinese: 认定自己是异性恋或者同性恋的男女比例相当。

sentences.english: Gays and lesbians do not choose their sexual orientation any more than heterosexuals do.
sentences.chinese: 男女同性恋不再像异性恋者那样选择自己的性取向。

sentences.english: All of the participants self-identified as heterosexual or bisexual.
sentences.chinese: 所有的参与者都声称是异性恋或者双性恋。

sentences.english: The handsome. nice and then heterosexual men are married.
sentences.chinese: 又帅又好的男北京男孩同志聊天室人是异性恋。
现代小说家都是异性恋主义者。

sentences.english: The handsome, nice, and heterosexual men are married.
sentences.chinese: 又帅又好又是异性恋的男人都结婚了。

sentences.english: That's one reason gays and lesbians end relationships sooner than heterosexuals.
sentences.chinese: 这也是同志关系持续的比异性恋来的短的原因之一。

sentences.english: In heterosexual men, the right hemisphere is slightly larger.
sentences.chinese: 异性恋男性的右脑容量大一些。

definition: fujoshi (woman who likes mangas about male homosexual love)
to come out of the closet/to reveal one's sexual orientation
to fall into bad company/to make acquaintances indiscriminately
sham marriage, esp. a marriage between a gay man and a lesbian arranged in response to parental expectations of a conventional marriage/abbr. for 形式婚姻
(slang) to engage in male homosexual practices
